Деятельность сайта INNWORK осуществляетс: The activities of the INNWORK website are carried out in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Armenia in the field of information protection and copyright of content.
Все размещенные на ресурс материалы нахо: All materials posted on the resource are freely available and can be downloaded for free from the Internet. Collection of the information on the network and placement of content in the catalog is carried out automatically
Публикация нелицензированного, похищенно: The posting of unlicensed, stolen and copyrighted content is not permitted. The administration posts only amateur materials from free sources using an automatic system.
На сайте INNWORK публикуются только фраг: The INNWORK website publishes only fragments of materials translated into Russian, English and Armenian, as well as content with amateur translation for review. The posting of original, untranslated materials is not possible.
Уведомляем вас о том, что мы строго собл: Please be advised that we strictly comply with copyright and intellectual property laws. The resource administration offers cooperation with the copyright holder of the content.  If you are the copyright holder of any content posted on our website without your permission, please contact us at the following contact details:
Адрес: Армения город Ереван улица Верин: • Address: Armenia Yerevan city Verin Antarain street 138/2
Пожалуйста, предоставьте нам следующую и: Please provide us with the following information to process your request:
Контактные данные, реквизиты вашей компа: • Contact information, details of your company;
Описание контента, который нарушает ваши: • Description of the content that violates your rights;
URL страницы, на которой размещен спорны: • URL of the page on which the controversial content is posted;
Заверенные сканированные копии документо: • Certified scanned copies of documents confirming your intellectual property rights;
В случае, если вы представляете интересы: • If you represent the interests of another company – copies of documents for intermediary services.
Мы обязуемся незамедлительно принять мер: We will take immediate action to remove or block content that violates your rights once we have received sufficient documentation and verification of your rights to it.
